シリウスシュガーのメンバーがそれぞれの座席に着くと、\nシミュレーターが起動した:
As the members of Sirius Sugaru each took their seats, the
simulator activated.
同時に、俺も着用したヘッドセットを通じて、彼女たちの見ている\n風景が視界に飛び:
At the same time, through the headset I was wearing, the
scenery they were looking at flew into my field of vision.
リアルそのものに感じるが、シミュレーターによって作成された\n仮想空間の演習場の:
It felt like real life itself, but it was like a training ground in a
virtual space created by a simulator.
今回はパターンＢ、ＭＧ競技をシミュレーションしていますわ。: This time, we're simulating pattern B and MG events.
ＭＧ同士の戦いで、敵にも同じ５機のＭＧが現れます。: In MG battles, the same five MGs will appear on the enemy.
どうしたの？ もう酔ったとか？: What's wrong? Are you drunk already?
いや、メイズであの化け物と戦うために、\n戦闘技術が必要ってのはわかった。:
No, I understood that I needed
combat skills in order to fight that monster in Mayse.
ただ、それってＭＧ同士の戦いで得られるスキルなのか？: It’s just, is that a skill you get from fighting MGs?
いい質問だね！ もちろん、ＭＧ相手とメイズシフター相手では、\n必要とされる装備:
That’s a good question! Of course, with MG opponents and Mayse-Sifter opponents, the equipment and skills required for
will change a lot.
でも相手が同じ人間の乗っているＭＧに負けたらどう感じる？: But how would you feel if your opponent lost to MG riding on the same person?
そーそー！ パイロット同士の対抗意識を刺激して、\n結果として総合的、そして基本: That's right! It stimulates the rivalry between pilots, and as a result, it leads to a comprehensive and basic improvement in piloting skills.
それがＭＧ同士での演習や訓練が行われる理由のひとつだよ。: That's one of the reasons MG training and MG exercises are held.
さあ、おしゃべりはここまでですわ。\n菱壱型、全集を警戒しつつ索敵開始！:
Now, that's all we have to say.
Hishi Type One, start searching for enemies while keeping an eye on the entire collection!
七彩の号令で、シリウスシュガーが隊列を組みつつ\n演習場を進んでいく。:
At Shichisai’s command, Sirius Sugaru advanced through the
training grounds in formation.
先ほどの補習の授業で学んだことだが、ＭＧは主兵装として\nパイロットの特性に合わ:
This was something I’d learned in my supplementary lessons earlier, but MGs were equipped with various armaments that matched the traits of
pilots as their main armament
一方で防御に回った場合、ＭＧは飛行能力を有するため、\n基本的に装甲は見た目より:
On the other hand, in the case of defense, MGs have the ability to fly, so
the armor is basically made thinner and lighter than it looks.
そのため、ＭＧ同士の戦いでは、一撃で相手を\n大破させることも可能であり、先制攻: Therefore, in a battle between MGs, it was possible to severely damage an opponent with a single blow, and the preemptive strike became more important than anything else
索敵能力の優劣が、そのまま勝敗に繋がると言っても\n過言ではない。: It wouldn’t be an exaggeration to say that superiority and inferiority in Enemy Search would lead to victory and defeat.
耳をつんざくような炸裂音が響き渡る。\n敵は前方の遮蔽物の影に潜んでいたらしい。:
An ear-splitting explosion rang out. The
Enemy seemed to be lurking in the shadows of cover up ahead.
わたくしと白奈さんで応射！\nめるさん、ちゆるさん、ラミさんは後退してください！:
Shirona-san and I will fire back!
Meguru-san, Chiyuru-san! Rami-san please retreat!
わかりました！ 後退しつつ援護します！: Understood! I'll cover you while you retreat!
七彩の指示通り、めるとちゆる、ラミの機体が\n後退していく。: Following Shichika's instructions, the lamia glider slowly retreats.
（まるで最初から察知していたかのようにスムーズだ）: (It's as smooth as if she sensed it from the start.)
（後退しつつも、ラミたち３機の射撃は前方の七彩たちを\nちゃんとフォローする形に:
(Even as they retreat, Rami and the other three fire at Shichika and the others in front of them, making sure to follow up with the
.)
これにより、七彩と白奈の両機は、\n敵の射線をかわしつつ遮蔽物への退避に成功した:
This allowed both Shichika and Shirona to successfully evacuate to cover while dodging the
enemy’s line of fire.
型通りの動きではあるが、七彩の指示もチーム全体の\n実行速度も申し分ない。:
It was a typical movement, but Shichika’s instructions and the team’s overall
execution speed were impeccable.
（この七彩の指示で、遮蔽物に留まっていた\n敵部隊の動きが封じられたな）:
(With these instructions from Shichisai, the movement of the
enemy unit that had stayed in cover has been blocked.)
側面から一気に叩きます！ 白奈さん！ ちゆるさん！: I'll hit you from the side! Miss Shirona! Miss Chiyuru!
後衛部隊からの支援攻撃によって、敵を拘束。\nその隙に、主力が側面から攻める。: A support attack from the rearguard forces restrains the enemy. The main force takes the opportunity to attack from both sides.
（典型というかテンプレ的というか、教科書通りだな。\n良くも……悪くも）: (I don't know if I should call it typical or tempting, but it's like a textbook. <b>For better or worse...)
他に敵影はないか確認お願いしますわ。: Please check to see if there are any other enemies.
おつかれさまでした！: Thank you for your hard work!
こうして、シリウスシュガーはあっさりと敵部隊を殲滅して、\nシミュレーションを終:
With that, Sirius Sugaru easily annihilated the enemy unit and finished the
simulation.
そうだな。悪くなかったと思うぞ。: That's right. I don't think it was bad.
それぞれが与えられた役割を理解して行動している。\n距離の取り方、指示への対応も:
Each of them understands the roles they've been assigned and acts accordingly. The
way they distance themselves and respond to instructions are also appropriate.
援護射撃でも、無駄な射撃をしないよう意識されている。: She’s conscious not to waste any time with support fire.
ふん、えらそーに。でも、これでわかったでしょ？\nラミたちが優秀だってコト。:
Hmph, you're right. But now you know, right? The
Rami and the others are excellent.
確かに、思った以上に彼女たちの技術は優秀だ。\nここまでの適性試験をくぐり抜けて:
It's true that their skills are better than I thought. They've passed the
aptitude test so far.
正直、俺はもっとひどいものかと思ってた。: Honestly, I thought it would be even worse.
ただし、懸念点がないとも言えない……: However, I can't say there's nothing to worry about...
なに？ いきなり大きな声を出して。何か思い出したの？: What? Why are you yelling all of a sudden? Did you remember something?
いや、そうじゃないが……次にお前らとすべきことがわかった。: No, that's not it, but... I know what I have to do with you guys next.
まずは、甘いモノでも食べに行こう！！: First, let's go eat something sweet!!
色々考えてみたんだが、まとめるには脳に糖分が必要だ。\nどこか甘いモノが食えると:
I've thought about it a lot, but I need sugar in my brain to put it all together.
I'd like you to show me where I can eat something sweet.
ああ。なるべく激甘で頼む。: Yeah. Try to be as sweet as possible.
ほんとはこいつ、特に何も考えてないんじゃないの？: Isn’t she really thinking about nothing in particular?
そうかもしれませんし、そうじゃないかもしれません。\n今は信じましょう。: That might be true, or maybe not. <b>Let's believe it for now.
うーん、まあ、七彩が言うなら……: Hmm, well, if Shichika says so...
